rules_text:
Whenever Slyten Connoisseur attacks, crystallize. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control or create a Treasure.)[/i]
Once each turn, when an artifact you control dies, you may pay 1 life. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: [i]“I can't tell where the journey will end, but I know where to start.”[/i]
